commentBody: Having lived in Massachusetts for a couple of decades, I can tell you that the stereotype of well-educated lefty applies mainly to an urban/suburban cadre of academics and graduates.  Don't forget the anti-busing protests. The typical MA voter is a blue-collar white Catholic. Their views match some Republican candidates'. Yes, they're pro-labor union and pro-many social programs and they're anti-death penalty. But they're also pro-gun rights, anti-abortion, and not as friendly to immigrants and people of color as you might think.
